articles.description: English-speaking fans are able to watch a dubbed version of Squid Game if they don't want subtitles
articles.content:
The second series of the hugely popular Netflix show Squid Game has been announced, but its creator has issued a warning to fans when it comes to getting the most out of viewing.
I'm sure I don't ne… [+2138 chars]

articles.title: Robbie Williams announces 2022 greatest hits UK tour - NME
articles.description: Tickets go on sale later this week
articles.content:
Robbie Williams has announced a greatest hits tour to mark 25 years since started his solo career.
